show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Mapping the Global Transition
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Hazel Henderson, author of the new e-book Mapping the Global Transition [free... <!--more--> at EthicalMarkets.com]; also CS on the societal conversations following the Isla Vista shootings; poem by Adrienne Rich
